snippet.title: Batman: Arkham Asylum  - Play as the Joker Trailer
snippet.description: Eidos, Inc. and Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment just revealed the new maddening Batman: Arkham Asylum trailer.  Showcasing the Play as The Joker feature available exclusive on the PlayStation® 3 version of this highly anticipated videogame, the trailer features the green haired clown in all his insane glory.
